game: „The gates of hell are open night and day; Smooth the descent and easy is the way:But to return and view the cheerful skies In this the task and mighty labor lies.“HellEscape is a 2D bullet hell with auto-fire and roguelike elements. Inspired by games like Magic Survivors and Vampire Survivors but takes a different approach. Only fully tested on windows.
